sentences.en: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.cn: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.en: ‘He's guilty.’ ‘Says you. I think he's innocent.’.
sentences.cn: “他有罪。” “胡扯！我认为他是清白的。”。

sentences.en: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.cn: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.en: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.cn: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

sentences.en: ‘That was a good landing.’ ‘I'll say!’.
sentences.cn: “着陆棒极了！”“当然！”。

sentences.en: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.cn: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.en: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.cn: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.en: a dull girl with little to say for herself.
sentences.cn: 几乎找不到话说的迟钝女孩。

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.cn: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.en: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.cn: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.en: He fumbled his lines, not knowing what he was going to say.
sentences.cn: 他因为不知道接下来要说什么而把台词给念砸了。

sentences.en: His friends say he was always quick to tell a joke.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们说，以前他讲笑话总是张嘴就来。

sentences.en: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.cn: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.en: I can't say any more, it's meant to be a big secret.
sentences.cn: 我再也无可奉告了，这本是重大的秘密。

sentences.en: I say, that's a bit much!.
sentences.cn: 喂！这有点儿过分了。

sentences.en: I think it'sfair to say that it didn't sound quite right.
sentences.cn: 我想应该说那听起来可不太对。

sentences.en: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.cn: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.en: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.cn: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.en: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

sentences.en: If we put out, say, twenty chairs, would that be enough?
sentences.cn: 如果我们搬出去比方说20把椅子，够不够?

sentences.en: Investigators say nearly $100,000 was wired into the suspect's bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 调查人员说有近10万美元汇入了嫌疑人的银行账户。

sentences.en: it goes without saying that lay appointees must be selected with care.
sentences.cn: 不用说，必须谨慎选择非业内的受托人。

sentences.en: it is easy to become sensitive, not to say paranoid.
sentences.cn: 虽不至于变成妄想狂，也容易变得敏感。

sentences.en: It is impossible to say who struck the fatal blow.
sentences.cn: 很难判断是谁给了致命的一击。

sentences.en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentences.en: Let’s say your plan fails, then what?
sentences.cn: 假设你的计划失败，那怎么办？

sentences.en: Let's take any writer, say (= for example) Dickens…
sentences.cn: 我们随便举一个作家为例，比如说狄更斯…

sentences.en: People always think I'm a fool, and I dare say they're right.
sentences.cn: 人们总认为我是个傻瓜，想必他们是对的。

sentences.en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentences.cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.en: What makes you say that (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.cn: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.en: you have a nerve, I must say!.
sentences.cn: 我得说，你真有魄力。

sentences.en: You have to be careful what you say on telly.
sentences.cn: 在电视上说话时你必须很谨慎。

sentences.en: You might say that we've been victims of circumstance.
sentences.cn: 你可以说我们一直不走运吧。
